titles.title: To require that the payment rate used to make any direct payments with respect to wheat for the 2008 through 2012 crop years be $1.20 per bushel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 2/16/2007--Introduced. Sets the direct wheat payment rate for crop years 2008-2012 at $1.20 per bushel.
